RelatedSentence: The interior ministry of Afghanistan following a statement said Mullah Abdullah was arrested from Pul-e-Alam city early Monday morning .
The statement further added that Mullah Abdullah was a key Taliban leader in Logar province and he was arrested during an operation by Afghan national army and Afghan national police forces .

A0: The interior ministry of Afghanistan following a statement
RelatedSentence: Interior ministry said Mullah Abdullah was involved in major terrorist attacks including roadside bombings in Pul-e-Alam city .
The interior ministry in a separate statement said at least three Taliban militants were killed and two others were injured during counter-terrorism operations in the past 24 hours .

A1: counter-terrorism operations in the past 24 hours
RelatedSentence: The operations were conducted by Afghan national army , Afghan national police and Afghan intelligence forces in Faryab , Zabul , Logar , Herat and Farah provinces of Afghanistan , interior ministry said , adding that Afghan security forces also confiscated various types of heavy and light weapons along with the explosives during the operations .
